title: Rivian made an electric ambulance for Grey's Anatomy
desc: It's a modified version of the Rivian Commercial Van.

title: Daisy Edgar-Jones Celebrated Her Debut Estée Lauder Campaign with a Chic Bash at Chateau Marmont
desc: In a city where 8 p.m. is practically midnight by local standards, Estée Lauder threw caution to the wind on Thursday evening, hosting a lavish celebration at the fabled Chateau Marmont to toast to English actress Daisy Edgar-Jones—the newest global brand ambassador.

title: Epstein sent £10,000 to Mandelson's partner, file releases reveal
desc: The emails were published by the US Department of Justice as part of a release running to three million pages.

title: Bruce Springsteen To Perform At Minneapolis Anti-ICE National Shutdown Protest
desc: Days after Springsteen released a song over the killing of two Americans by ICE agents, the Boss is going to perform as a part of today's National Shutdown protest.

title: Mimili artists talk of Country, community, survival in remote APY Lands
desc: The artists of Mimili, in the APY Lands of South Australia, are using new methods to share crucial knowledge of Country and culture, including repurposed car parts.

title: Claire Byrne promises 'more personality and more opinions' on new Newstalk show
desc: The veteran presenter joins the station after 15 years with RTÉ.

title: Skier Lindsey Vonn Injured in Crash Days Before 2026 Winter Olympics
desc: Lindsey Vonn was airlifted after crashing in Switzerland, threatening her Olympic comeback just days before the Milan Cortina Games.

title: The Spiciest Standard Decklists from Pro Tour Lorwyn Eclipsed
desc: Several competitors have brought fresh decks powered by cards from Lorwyn Eclipsed. Explore their strategies, then watch them battle it out at the Pro Tour.

title: Two men 'caught red handed' in seizure of €472,000 worth of cannabis
desc: Thomas Doody (32) and Gavin Downey (30) were charged with possession and possession for sale of supply of cannabis at Glennamucklagh West in Newmarket, Co Cork on Wednesday.

title: GameStop CEO Ryan Cohen targets consumer mega deal
desc: Ryan Cohen wouldn't say whether he would sell GameStop's bitcoin to try to pull off a major acquisition.
